mapper.insert: insert into GOODS_IMAGE(NUM, GOODSCODE, SAVENAME) values(GOODS_IMAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{goodsCode}, #{saveName})
mapper.select: select SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
select IMAGE.GOODSCODE, IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI
